plot: Four beautiful girls compete for the coveted title of Miss Ripe and the opportunity to have a private photo shoot from one of LA's top photographers.
plot_en: Four beautiful girls compete for the coveted title of Miss Ripe and the opportunity to have a private photo shoot from one of LA's top photographers.
plot_es: Four beautiful girls compete for the coveted title of Miss Ripe and the opportunity to have a private photo shoot from one of LA's top photographers.
title: Picking Miss Ripe
